front.title: The Session Initiation Protocol User Agent Identity Profile Data Set

abstract.t: This document defines the properties and data format for the SIP user agent identity profile data set. The properties in this data set define identities or SIP address of records (AORs) related to incoming or outgoing SIP signaling on a user agent. The identities may be those that are registered via the SIP REGISTER method or identities which are provisioned on the user agent. These identities may be used or referenced when defining identity specific handling related to SIP features on the user agent.
